summary: A configuration container for the Encodec audio compression model that encapsulates all architectural and preprocessing parameters needed to build the encoder‑decoder network, such as target bandwidths, sampling rate, channel count, normalization, chunking strategy, convolutional kernel sizes, residual and dilation settings, up/down‑sampling ratios, LSTM depth, codebook dimensions, and optional causal behavior.
business_intent: Enable developers to reliably reproduce and customize Encodec models for audio encoding tasks, allowing easy integration into speech or music processing pipelines with adjustable quality, latency, and model capacity.
